| HistoryText             = 

The [[Saur-Lords (Earth-616)|Saur-Lords]] are genetically modified uplifted dinosaurs created as servants by the [[High Technician (Earth-616)|High Technician]] in his time in the [[Savage Land]]. 

When [[A.I.M.]] came to the Savage Land they attacked and caught [[Kevin Plunder (Earth-616)|Ka-Zar]] and were taken to the Saur-Lords. The Saur-Lords were not impressed due to him being a human. [[Zabu]] was later attacked by two of the Saur-Lords, but [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]] came to his aid. Together the pair battled the dinosaur men but eventually A.I.M. surrounded them and they were ordered to surrender.

[[Rachel Leighton (Earth-616)|Diamondback]] disguised as an A.I.M. agent, rescued them by causing disruption in the Saur-Lords' ranks. Diamondback shot the Saur-Lord called Allo, but Anky continued to fight even though Zabu eventually won. They met up with [[Samuel Wilson (Earth-616)|Falcon]] and continued their journey.

The Saur-Lord Pter abducts [[Maza]], a native of the [[Savage Land]], from the 
[[T'Challa (Earth-616)|Black Panther's]] Skycycle. Black Panther then tracked the dinosaurs to their citadel. Anky and Allo recovered and were found by the A.I.M. agents. The Dino-Lords consisting of Pter, Styro and Bront fought the trio of heroes at the citadel after their master the [[High Technician (Earth-616)|High Technician]] was knocked out. 

Suddenly, the citadel was attacked by the alien invader [[Terminus]]. Styro and Pter attempt to protect their master from Terminus, but both their efforts were in vain and they were tossed aside like flies.{{r|Captain America #414|417}}
